com.eep.taxe.models

Class Age

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eep.taxe.models.Age
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgeInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Age>

    public class Age
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgeInterface
    Represents an Age in the Game, such as the Stone Age. It is used to easily categorise resources, trains, and whatever you may want to relate to a particular Age in the game.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static class  Age.Ages
      The internal representation of an Age is done using the Ages enumerator type.
